dcterms:creator: Marcus Hutter
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 100 million characters taken from 205 different characters including alphabets, XML markups, and special symbols, modeled at the character-level to predict the next character of the input sequence.
dcterms:title: Hutter Prize Wikipedia dataset

dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
LÃ©on Bottou
Yoshua Bengio
Patrick Haffner
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 50000 training and 10000 validation/test handwritten digit images of size 28x28.
dcterms:title: MNIST dataset

dcterms:creator: Quoc V Le
Navdeep Jaitly
Geoffrey E Hinton
dcterms:description: A sequential version of the MNIST dataset where the goal is to classify the digit after sequentially reading the pixels in a scan-line order.
dcterms:title: Sequential MNIST

dcterms:creator: Martin Arjovsky
Amar Shah
Yoshua Bengio
dcterms:description: A permuted version of the MNIST dataset where the original image pixels are permuted in a fixed random order, resulting in a problem that has longer range dependencies across pixels.
dcterms:title: Sequential Permuted MNIST (pMNIST)

dcterms:creator: Nal Kalchbrenner
Ivo Danihelka
Alex Graves
dcterms:description: A dataset for the addition task where the network sums two 15-digit integers, reading one digit per timestep and predicting the summation.
dcterms:title: Addition task dataset

dcterms:creator: Nal Kalchbrenner
Ivo Danihelka
Alex Graves
dcterms:description: A dataset for the memorization task where the goal is to memorize a sequence of 20 random symbols.
dcterms:title: Memorization task dataset
